mapper.insert: insert into payment_record(id, pay_id, collect_id, cost, pay_type, transaction, transaction_id, createTime) value(null,#{payId},#{collectId},#{cost},#{payType},#{transaction},#{transactionId},now())
mapper.select:
select payment_record.*,user.name as userName,user.id as userid from payment_record,user
((payment_record.pay_id=#{id} and user.id=payment_record.collect_id) or (payment_record.collect_id=#{id} and user.id=payment_record.pay_id))
and user.name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and payment_record.transaction=#{transaction}
and payment_record.transaction_id like concat('%',#{transactionId},'%')
